title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: This should result in only one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the application
2. Enable word wrap mode in the StyledText
3. Append N lines of text to the StyledText
4. Observe the number of redraws happening in the client area
